mods.abstract: Typed purchase order on an envelope for Mel Hummitzsch. Receipt indicates agreed price, size, order quantity, shipping location and description. To view the poster for this order see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/28038.
